requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit only)
  • Processor: i7-2600 3.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit only)
  • Processor: i7-7700 3.6 Ghz
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

requirements_en.minimum:

  • OS: Windows Vista
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:

  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 970/Radeon RX470 or better

  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
